K&K Cabinets and Countertops is a custom made, one a time, product to enhance people’s homes by ergonomic means, aesthetics, and the way people cook, entertain and communicate in their kitchen space. We are truly custom, and every one of our projects is custom and taylored to you.

Our Process
Buy Canadian
Meet our Designer

​Zenia Horton has been designing award-winning kitchens, baths, and custom built ins for residential and commercial clients throughout Ontario for the past 20 years. Zenia is a real designer- an artist..which is really just a nice way of saying she's kind of quirky! Working with Zen is entertaining, enlightening and engaging. Her passion and artistry is captured in every design and exceeding your expectations is her mission. Her goal as your designer is to maximize the functionality, beauty and enjoyment of your space; she has a reputation for thinking outside-the-box and consistently delivers best in class solutions and "wow-factor" design.

"Being able to work alongside the skilled craftsmen and installers at K&K to help deliver your vision has been a dream come true."

So isn't it about time that you brought balance, simplicity and some "zen" into your space?

Our Process

Meet with one of our designers and we work with you one on one to create your dream design. You tell us what you want and we will go to work to create it. One of the most amazing and unique things about K&K Cabinets and Countertops is that we can control so much of the process for the client. The same technician always measures your space, then manufactures the cabinets and installs them. We create as much as we can in our local shop so that there is less cutting during the installation in your home. With K&K Cabinets, we create and manufacture our own doors and have our own spray booth so we can control so much of the process for the client; this way we can even have flexibility in our delivery dates.

Buy Canadian

With K&K Cabinets, we create and manufacture our own doors and have our own spray booth so we can control so much of the process for the client; this way we can even have flexibility in our delivery dates. We are a Canadian company so therefore we you buy from K&K you are supporting the Canadian economy and employing local people and supporting local business. There are no hidden extra costs of duties and import fees, we are here for you as we are a small local company that cares, and buying from K&k reduces your carbon footprint.
